inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed epilepsy or history of first unprovoked, witnessed seizure
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13

exclusion.criterion: Lack of consent provoked seizure due to obvious
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Acute lesion on CT (e.g. stroke, hemorrhage
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Provoked seizure due to obvious, chronic lesion on CT (e.g. vascular malformation,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Progressive brain disease (e.g. neoplastic, infectious, demyelinating diseases)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of epilepsy longer than 1 year at presentation to FSC
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: The patient first developed seizures at age 13

exclusion.criterion: History of AED treatment for more than 4 weeks
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of severe intellectual disability, CHF, and epilepsy. He presented with facial twitching on the right and generalized shaking in his NH which required 20 mg valium to cease seizure activity.
